title: 1950년 Walker 사건
summary: 미국 Alabama, AL 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Walker. 판결일: 1950-05-09. 법원: Alabama Court of Appeals.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Andrew J. WALKER v. STATE
**판결일**: 1950-05-09
**법원**: Alabama Court of Appeals
**관할**: Alabama, AL

**판사**: Bricken

## 변호인

A. A. Carmichael, Atty. Gen., for the State.

## 인용

- 35 Ala. App. 724
- 47 So. 2d 926

## 판결문 요약


Appeal from Law and Equity Court, Lauderdale County; Raymond Murphy, Judge.
Assault with weapon.
BRICKEN, Presiding Judge.
Appeal dismissed, motion of appellant.
